channel.title: Weather at Amarillo, Amarillo International Airport, TX - via NOAA's National Weather Service
channel.description: Weather conditions from NOAA's National Weather Service.

item.title: Partly Cloudy and 80 F at Amarillo, Amarillo International Airport, TX
item.description: Winds are from the Southeast at 19.6 gusting to 25.3 MPH (17 gusting to 22 KT). The pressure is 1012.0 mb and the humidity is 58%. The heat index is 82. Last Updated on Jul 23 2020, 8:53 pm CDT.
